static.description: Defines permitted employee user group actions
static.statement: permit (    principal in PetStoreApp::UserGroup::"<userPoolId>|employee",    action in        [PetStoreApp::Action::"GET /pets",         PetStoreApp::Action::"POST /pets",         PetStoreApp::Action::"GET /pets/{petId}",         PetStoreApp::Action::"PUT /pets/{petId}"],    resource);
